item.title: Moodle LMS for Compliance Training
item.dc:creator: vijay
item.description:
Moodle LMS is a free and powerful learning management system that can help you set up and manage your compliance training courses effectively. Compliance training is an essential part of any organisations learning and development strategy, as it helps ensure that employees understand and comply with legal and regulatory requirements. Here’s how you can do ... Read more

This post first appeared on https://trainwell.com.au/

item.title: Add CSS to Text block – Moodle LMS
item.dc:creator: vijay
item.description:
Any CSS we add to the Text Block gets deleted by Moodle LMS on Save. Add customs styles to an individual course page using this tip.

This post first appeared on https://trainwell.com.au/

item.title: Styling emails in Moodle & Totara LMS
item.dc:creator: vijay
item.description:
Save yourself the pain of coding your Totara emailÂ template from scratch. Brand your emails to look good in email clients like Outlook.

This post first appeared on https://trainwell.com.au/

item.title: Modify the correct language string easily in Totara LMS
item.dc:creator: vijay
item.description:
Use the &strings=1 parameter to show the origin of a language string and filter or find the correct string to modify e.g. 'Other evidence' in Record of Learning

This post first appeared on https://trainwell.com.au/
